isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ 5 Engine Service Manual - High-pressure Oil System - Cleaning and Inspection - Branch Tube

step1.para: Clean and inspect the branch tube assembly end blocks for debris, galling or other damage indicating evidence of misalignment. Replace the branch tube assembly as required.

Inspect branch tube adapter bores, the outside of the adapter connection and the inside of the pump connection for debris, galling or other damage indicating misalignment or defects. Replace adapter as required.
Clean and inspect the brazed joints for cracks or other indications of joint failure. Replace branch tube assembly as required.

Clean and inspect the branch tube adapter (if high-pressure oil pump assembly was not removed) O-ring groove for dirt, raised metal or other indications of seal failure. Correct any defects as required.
